name: Berlock Bromes - and the mystery of the 100 Ninjas!
name_original: Berlock Bromes - and the mystery of the 100 Ninjas!
description:
A most mysterious case. The missing dog is nowhere to be found. Does it even exist? And why summon Berlock Bromes, master detective, for such a trivial matter?

There can be only one explanation... and it appears to involve 100 ninja assassins.

Created in a week for the Doborog Games internal August Game Jam!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to rotate and attack
  • Ctrl to Dodge Roll
  • E to intercept an attack and counter

Also supports controller!

Game by Erik Rydeman
Music by Josh Mathews
Voice Acting by Craigz and Josh Mathews
